meanings.definition: A person or thing that revives.
meanings.sent1: The old photographs were the revivers of memories.
meanings.sent2: The paramedics were the revivers of the injured man.
meanings.sent3: The cup of coffee acted as a reviver for the tired student.
meanings.sent4: Her encouraging words served as revivers for his spirit.
meanings.sent5: The sunrise was a natural reviver, bringing energy to all who witnessed it.

meanings.sent1: The team of revivers worked together to bring the patient back to life.
meanings.sent2: The revivers in the crowd cheered on the marathon runners.
meanings.sent3: The group of revivers gathered to celebrate their successful mission.
meanings.sent4: The revivers at the party kept the atmosphere lively and fun.
meanings.sent5: The revivers in the choir lifted their voices in harmony, filling the room with music.
